thread.title: Amal Clooney pregnancy photos: George’s wife shows off baby bump on red carpet
thread.title_full: Amal Clooney pregnancy photos: George’s wife shows off baby bump on red carpet

title: Amal Clooney pregnancy photos: George’s wife shows off baby bump on red carpet
text:
Clooney had her baby bump on display at an event in Paris. The Sun Share on Twitter 
AMAL Clooney has showcased her baby bump for the first time since it emerged that she and husband George are expecting twins. 
The 39-year-old human rights lawyer walked the red carpet at the Cesar Awards in Paris with George and looked stunning as she posed for cameras, The Sun reports. Amal’s baby bump was on display as she walked the red carpet for the Cesar Awards. Source: AP 
Dressed in a figure hugging white dress with feather detail, Amal looked happy and radiant as her blossoming baby bump was proudly on display. 
Once inside the awards, the couple who married in 2015 put on a loving display of affection and smiled as the held hands. The couple appeared to be having a fantastic time inside smiling for the cameras. Source: AP 
On Tuesday George finally opened up about wife Amal’s pregnancy, revealing his excitement at the birth of their twins. 
Earlier this month US talk show host Julie Chen revealed that the A-list couple would be having twins, which was later confirmed by the actor’s mum. Clooney is expecting twins in June. Source: AP 
Until now, the 55-year-old actor was yet to confirm the news himself, but when asked about the pregnancy during an interview on the French program Rencontres de Cinema he couldn’t help gushing about the news. 
He revealed: “We are really happy and really excited. It’s going to be an adventure.” 
George then said that they had “sort of embraced it all” with “arms wide open”. George Clooney recently spoke about his excitement for the twins. Source: AP 
The actor also spoke about how his friends reacted when he told them the good news: “It got really quiet and they all just started making baby crying noises, and the whole table just busted up laughing.” 
He said that his pals did joke about his age, but said that he looks to other actors who have had their children at a later age like Jean-Paul Belmondo, who had a baby with his second wife at the age of 70 in 2003. 
He joked: “So, I’m feeling a little better about being 56 by the time [the twins come].” 
This article originally appeared on The Sun and has been republished here with permission.
